original_text: And as for those of you who are left, I will send faintness into their hearts in the lands of their enemies. The sound of a driven leaf shall put them to flight, and they shall flee as one flees from the sword, and they shall fall when none pursues.
korean_text: 너희 남은 자에게는 그 원수들의 땅에서 내가 그들의 마음을 약하게 하리니 그들은 바람에 불린 잎사귀 소리에도 놀라 도망하기를 칼을 피하여 도망하듯 할 것이요 쫓는 자가 없어도 엎드러질 것이라

sentences.original_text: And as for those of you who are left
I will send faintness into their hearts
in the lands of their enemies
The sound of a driven leaf shall put them to flight
sentences.korean_translation: 바람에 불리는 잎사귀 소리에도 그들이 도망할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they shall flee as one flees from the sword
and they shall fall when none pursues
